entry.question: What Cards are banned in Constructed Tournaments?
entry.answer: The Battle Cards Swap Parts and Press the Advantage are banned from use in Constructed play. The Battle Card Multi-Mission Gear has also been announced as banned, though the Tournament Rules have not been updated.
